Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

I am still on the soccer team. We have a tournament coming up next week that I'm really excited for. I think we might have a chance to win it! ### Speaker B: Striker, right? Do you like a particular US or FIFA team? ### Speaker A: I love Arsenal, even though they aren't doing so well lately. I can't wait for the season to start up again.
